title: VoiceHub
description: VoiceHub is a real-time group voice calling platform designed for seamless communication. The app supports multiple users in a single call, providing a high-quality audio experience.

title: i-Notebook
description: i-Notebook is a versatile and user-friendly note-taking application designed to streamline the process of managing your notes and to-dos. The platform supports creating, editing, and organizing notes efficiently, making it perfect for students, professionals, and anyone looking to enhance their productivity.

title: Binary Search Tree Visualizer
description: Binary Search Tree Visualizer is a web application that helps users understand the operations of a binary search tree through interactive visualizations. The application is ideal for students and educators to demonstrate and explore binary search tree operations.

title: Sudoku
description: Sudoku is a web-based game that allows users to play and solve Sudoku puzzles. This interactive application features multiple difficulty levels and a user-friendly interface.

title: Airbnb Homepage Clone
description: Airbnb Homepage Clone is a static replica of the Airbnb homepage created using HTML and CSS. This project demonstrates skills in front-end development and attention to detail in recreating a well-known website's layout and styling.
